rdf:Description.dc:title: Outa Karel’s Stories
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Sanni Metelerkamp (1867–1945)
Constance Penstone (1864–1928)

rdf:Description.dc:subject: Tales, African -- South Africa
Folklore, African -- South Africa
rdf:Description.dc:description: A collection of Bushman tales as adopted by the Boer settlers of South Africa, with a large number of Afrikaans words sprinkled in.
